tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE accommodations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    water_usage DECIMAL
)
CREATE TABLE accommodations (id INT, name VARCHAR(255), location VARCHAR(255), water_usage DECIMAL(10, 2));
CREATE TABLE conservation_strategies (id INT, strategy_name VARCHAR(255), description TEXT, implementation_date DATE);
CREATE TABLE accommodations (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), address VARCHAR(255), water_usage DECIMAL(10, 2));
CREATE TABLE conservation_strategies (id INT PRIMARY KEY, strategy_name VARCHAR(255), description TEXT);
CREATE TABLE water_usage_logs (id INT PRIMARY KEY, accommodation_id INT, water_used DECIMAL(10, 2), log_date DATE);

CREATE TABLE accommodations (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name TEXT,
  location TEXT,
  capacity INT,
  water_usage FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE rooms (
  room_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  accommodation_id INT,
  room_type TEXT,
  capacity INT,
  status TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE bookings (
  booking_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  room_id INT,
  guest_name TEXT,
  check_in_date DATE,
  check_out_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE water_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  accommodation_id INT,
  room_id INT,
 water_consumed FLOAT,
 log_date DATE
);
